quote: our dispassionate acceptance of attrition...[can] be matched by a full use of everything that has ever happened in all the long wonderful-ghastly years to free a person's mind from his body.
quote_letters: OUR DISPASSIONATE ACCEPTANCE OF ATTRITIONCAN BE MATCHED BY A FULL USE OF EVERYTHING THAT HAS EVER HAPPENED IN ALL THE LONG WONDERFUL-GHASTLY YEARS TO FREE A PERSONS MIND FROM HIS BODY
